TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ToolboxService extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDiscoveryService, class System.Drawing.Design.IToolboxService
Public MustInherit Class ToolboxService Implements IComponentDiscoveryService, IToolboxService
public ref class ToolboxService abstract : System::ComponentModel::Design::IComponentDiscoveryService, System::Drawing::Design::IToolboxService

summary.span: 提供 介面的預設實作。

span.span: Provides a default implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是部分實作介面。The class is a partial implementation of the interface. 若要使用此實作中，您必須衍生自這個類別並實作抽象方法。To use this implementation you must derive from this class and implement the abstract methods. 實作後，您可以加入這個類別設計工具應用程式的服務容器。Once implemented, you may add this class to your designer application's service container. 應該要有一個工具箱服務每個設計工具應用程式。There should be one toolbox service for each designer application. 提供許多複雜的邏輯，建立 [工具箱] 服務，但會要求您定義的分類和項目儲存體容器。 provides much of the complex logic of creating a toolbox service, but requires that you define the storage containers for categories and items. 這可讓簡單工具箱或非常複雜的。This allows for simple toolboxes or very complex ones.

permission.span: 系統資源的完整存取權。

span.span: for full access to system resources.
Demand values: , .
Associated state:

summary.span: 取得字串集合，描述工具箱的可用分類。

span.span: Gets a collection of strings depicting available categories of the toolbox.
A collection of category names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別目錄名稱會對應至不同的工具箱分類。The category names correspond to various toolbox categories. 如果 [工具箱] 未實作任何形式的分類，屬性可能會傳回空集合。If a toolbox does not implement any form of categories, the property may return an empty collection.

summary.span: 從工具箱項目或儲存的資料物件建立新的工具箱項目容器。

span.span: Creates a new toolbox item container from a toolbox item or a saved data object.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItemContainer CreateItemContainer (System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject dataObject);

param.name: dataObject
param.span: 資料物件，包含儲存的工具箱資料。

span.span: A data object containing saved toolbox data.

summary.span: 從儲存的資料物件建立新的工具箱項目容器。

span.span: Creates a new toolbox item container from a saved data object.

returns.span: 新的工具箱項目容器。

span.span: A new toolbox item container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您提供的衍生的版本。The method gives you the opportunity to provide a derived version of a . 根據預設，類別不支援連結的項目，以便傳回`null`連結參數不是`null`。By default, the class does not support linked items, so it returns `null` for link parameters that are not `null`. 若要提供連結支援，您應該覆寫此方法以建立衍生能夠處理連結。To provide link support, you should override this method to create a derived that is capable of handling links. 傳入的資料物件應該包含在先前呼叫從取得的資料工具箱項目容器上的屬性。The data object passed in should contain data obtained from a prior call to the property on a toolbox item container.

span.span: is .

para.span: 連結的工具箱項目是其存在繫結至特定的設計工具主應用程式的儲存體。

span.span: A linked toolbox item is one whose existence is tied to the storage of a particular designer host.

para.span: 因此，在典型的專案系統中，設計工具主應用程式都與特定檔案。

span.span: So, in a typical project system, a designer host is associated with a particular file.

para.span: 當設計工具主應用程式來源檔案遭到刪除，或從專案移除工具箱項目連結至設計工具主應用程式會自動刪除從 [工具箱]。

span.span: A toolbox item linked to a designer host would automatically be deleted from the toolbox when the designer host’s source file is deleted or removed from the project.

para.span: 連結的工具箱項目讓可能的案例，例如停用[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]工具箱項目，開啟 Windows Form 設計工具時。

span.span: Linked toolbox items make possible scenarios such as disabling the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] toolbox items when the Windows Forms designer is open.

returns.span: 新的工具箱項目容器。

span.span: A new toolbox item container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您提供的衍生的版本。The method gives you the opportunity to provide a derived version of a . 根據預設，類別不支援連結的項目，以便傳回`null`連結參數不是`null`。By default, the class does not support linked items, so it returns `null` for link parameters that are not `null`. 若要提供連結支援，您應該覆寫此方法以建立衍生能夠處理連結。To provide link support, you should override this method to create a derived that is capable of handling links. 如果提供連結參數會指派，表示這是連結的工具箱項目。If the provided link parameter is assigned, it indicates that this is a linked toolbox item.

span.span: is .

para.span: 連結的工具箱項目是其存在繫結至特定的設計工具主應用程式的儲存體。

span.span: A linked toolbox item is one whose existence is tied to the storage of a particular designer host.

para.span: 因此，在典型的專案系統中，設計工具主應用程式都與特定檔案。

span.span: So, in a typical project system, a designer host is associated with a particular file.

para.span: 當設計工具主應用程式來源檔案遭到刪除，或從專案移除工具箱項目連結至設計工具主應用程式會自動刪除從 [工具箱]。

span.span: A toolbox item linked to a designer host would automatically be deleted from the toolbox when the designer host’s source file is deleted or removed from the project.

para.span: 連結的工具箱項目讓可能的案例，例如停用[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]工具箱項目，開啟 Windows Form 設計工具時。

span.span: Linked toolbox items make possible scenarios such as disabling the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] toolbox items when the Windows Forms designer is open.

summary.span: 在工具箱服務偵測到現用設計工具的工具箱項目篩選條件已變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the toolbox service detects that the active designer’s toolbox item filter has changed.

summary.span: 傳回 ，其中包含工具箱的所有項目。

span.span: Returns an containing all items on the toolbox.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在清單中的項目必須是物件。The items in the list must be objects. 如果工具箱實作在類別目錄組織，這會擷取合併所有類別目錄的清單。If the toolbox implementation is organized in categories, this retrieves a combined list of all categories. 清單必須是讀取/寫入，因為可能會加入新項目。The list must be read/write, as new items may be added to it. 當工具箱服務加入新項目時，它會先呼叫方法，然後新增到新項目從傳回方法。When the toolbox service adds a new item, it first calls the method and then adds the new item to the returned from the method. 如果提供類別目錄名稱，則只有該分類中的項目應該會傳回。If a category name is provided, only the items in that category should be returned. 如果未不指定任何類別，則應該會傳回所有項目。If no category is specified, all items should be returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.ICollection GetToolboxItems (System.Reflection.AssemblyName an);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.ICollection GetToolboxItems(class System.Reflection.AssemblyName an) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetToolboxItems (an As AssemblyName) As ICollection
public: static System::Collections::ICollection ^ GetToolboxItems(System::Reflection::AssemblyName ^ an);

param.name: an
param.span: 要載入組件的來源組件名稱。

span.span: An assembly name from which to load an assembly.

summary.span: 傳回指定組件之 物件的 。

span.span: Returns an of objects for the given assembly.

returns.span: 包含組件中所有工具箱項目的集合，該組件是由指定的組件名稱所表示。

span.span: A collection containing all the toolbox items in the assembly represented by the given assembly name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法掃描支援工具箱項目，並傳回項目，這些類型的所有類型的組件。The method scans the assembly for all types that support toolbox items, and return items for those types. 若要支援的工具箱項目，型別必須具有下列特性：To support a toolbox item, a type must have the following characteristics: - 是公用的。Be public. - 實作 。Implement . - 不能為抽象。Not be abstract. - 沒有設`false`根據其類型。Not have a set to `false` on its type. - 包含泛型參數。Not contain generic parameters. 組件已鎖定持續時間的處理程序，因此列舉透過各種檔案可能會導致許多要載入的組件。Assemblies are locked for the duration of a process, so enumerating various files through can cause many assemblies to be loaded. 方法會採用組件名稱建立個別搜尋組件。The methods that take an assembly name create a separate to search assemblies. 完成列舉物件的組件集合，您可以呼叫方法，這個方法會卸載並釋放載入的組件上的檔案參考。When you are finished enumerating objects for a set of assemblies, you can call the method, which unloads the and frees the file references on the loaded assemblies. 以這種方式載入的組件會載入個別以便稍後進行卸載。Assemblies loaded in this manner are loaded into a separate so they can later be unloaded. 這只會短暫鎖定的組件檔案。This only momentarily locks the assembly file.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 傳回值，指出指定的資料物件是否表示項目容器。

returns.span: 如果指定的資料物件表示項目容器，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the given data object represents an item container; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料物件直接代表項目容器，或未登錄來處理資料物件內所包含的格式的自訂工具箱建立者。The data object may directly represent an item container, or there may be a custom toolbox creator that is registered to handle the format contained within the data object. 如果`host`參數是有效的設計工具主機方法會搜尋與設計工具主應用程式相關聯的工具箱項目建立者。If the `host` parameter is a valid designer host, the method searches toolbox item creators that are associated with the designer host. 如果`host`是提供，與主機相關聯的工具箱項目建立者也會比較。If `host` is supplied, toolbox item creators that are associated with the host are also compared.

span.span: is .

Protected MustOverride Sub Refresh ()
protected: abstract void Refresh();

summary.span: 重新整理工具箱項目的狀態。

span.span: Refreshes the state of the toolbox items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法時，由呼叫工具箱服務使用者已要求應該重新整理的項目集合。The method is called by the toolbox service when a user has requested that the collection of items should be refreshed. 集合一律都是目前的如果沒有需要提供任何實作。If the collection is always current, there is no need to provide any implementation here. 如果從集合傳回表示快照集的工具箱項目時，不過，這個方法讓您有機會加以更新。If the collection returned from represents a snapshot of the toolbox items, however, this method provides an opportunity to update them.

value.span: 字串，包含目前選取之分類的名稱。

span.span: A string containing the name of the currently selected category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般情況下，工具箱項目會以類別目錄分組。In general, toolbox items are grouped into categories.

summary.span: 在使用者報告已使用選取的工具箱項目時，接收來自工具箱服務的呼叫。

span.span: Receives a call from the toolbox service when a user reports that a selected toolbox item has been used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法時，由呼叫工具箱服務報表的使用者已使用選取的工具箱項目。The method is called by the toolbox service when a user reports that the selected toolbox item has been used. 叫用工具箱項目，之後，取消選取 [工具箱] 項目的通用使用者介面 (UI) 行為。After invoking a toolbox item, it is a common user interface (UI) behavior to cancel the selection of that toolbox item. 這個方法的預設實作會取消選取工具箱項目設定為選取的項目容器`null`。The default implementation of this method cancels the selection of the toolbox item by setting the selected item container to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual bool SetCursor ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SetCursor() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function SetCursor () As Boolean
protected: virtual bool SetCursor();

summary.span: 設定目前應用程式的游標為表示目前選取工具的游標。

span.span: Sets the current application's cursor to a cursor that represents the currently selected tool.

returns.span: 如果有選取的項目，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if there is an item selected; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工具箱服務使用者介面 (UI) 資料指標，將設定為影像，表示目前選取的工具箱項目提供支援。The toolbox service provides support for setting the user interface (UI) cursor to an image that represents the currently selected toolbox item. 方法可以呼叫以設定資料指標。The method can be called to set the cursor. 它會傳回`true`如果設定資料指標，或`false`如果不是。It returns `true` if the cursor is set, or `false` if it is not. 預設實作十字形狀並設定資料指標，並傳回`true`如果沒有選取項目。The default implementation sets the cursor to a crosshair and returns `true` if there is an item selected. 它會傳回`false`保持不變，如果不選取任何項目是將資料指標保留。It returns `false` and leaves the cursor unchanged if no item is selected.
